author: adityagupta1010
content: I needed some help in understanding execution spec tests and hive tests for Kaustinen devnet, can someone give a general overview of it, where to look for them, what specs they cover till now, and what are still remaining

author: jsign
content:
In https://github.com/ethereum/execution-spec-tests there's a dedicated branch for `verkle/main`. Today it has generic state conversion test. Then in https://github.com/ethereum/execution-spec-tests/pull/659 I'm working on 6800, 4762 and 7709.
Today we haven't shared any fixtures to run since we're currently working with <@755913785620824175> on this since Verkle requires many changes both in the testing framework and also in t8n-env for filling. Quite soon we'll finish with some remaining tasks and we'll share a first set of fixtures ready to be used by clients. Our goal is to have as many fixtures as possible ready before the next devnet launch.
